text: khea(phx) klaw wa “chan ca mi sng khea pi kab phwk cea cnkwa phwk cea ca na sayya ca kxallxh hı kæ chan seiy kxn wa phwk cea ca na khea klab ma xyang nænxn wentæ phwk cea ca thuk pid lxm” meux phwk khea di hı sayya khxng phwk khea kæ khea læw (phx) klaw wa”xallxh thrng pen phyan tx sing thi rea sayya wi”
